entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
